I'm also facing the same issue. it seems like the weekly menu page is broken and not loading anything. <https://www-staging.goodchop.com/weekly-menu>

elements.text: I'm also facing the same issue. it seems like the weekly menu page is broken and not loading anything.

_thread_replies.text: The menu was not being loaded

elements.text: The menu was not being loaded

_thread_replies.text: Ah ok, it seems to be up now. re-running the tests.:loading-food:

elements.text: Ah ok, it seems to be up now. re-running the tests.

_thread_replies.text: I disabled the menu on ccm and enabled it again :fingers_crossed:

elements.text: I disabled the menu on ccm and enabled it again

_thread_replies.text: Thanks <@U0184T48L74>. Tests are passing now.:rocket:
thanks <@U0184T48L74>!

This test is failing in master and blocking my PR

e2e-tests/pr/wl-pre-checkout-selection/checkoutWithFreeAddonsPopup.spec.ts

_thread_replies.text:
Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible :blobthumbsup:

Meanwhile, please check our <https://hellofresh.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/TNV/pages/4049372305/How+tos|How-To section>. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

elements.text: Thanks for the report! We will get back to you as soon as possible
. It might help you speed up the process depending on the type of the request.

_thread_replies.text:
Hi <@U03PN0VRC2F>, did you try to check what was failing at the E2E before?

If you check your PR it flags what's failing, and in your case the API was returning 500 but expecting 200, so likely an issue with the service

elements.text:
, did you try to check what was failing at the E2E before?

If you check your PR it flags what's failing, and in your case the API was returning 500 but expecting 200, so likely an issue with the service

_thread_replies.text: Yesterday there was an incident (<https://hellofresh.slack.com/archives/C09E0EB9CV9>) apparently related to auth having issues, so it probably has a cascading issue making some E2E failing

elements.text: ) apparently related to auth having issues, so it probably has a cascading issue making some E2E failing

_thread_replies.text: By just rerunning your checks today <https://github.com/hellofresh/web/actions/runs/17555279673?pr=57229|it passed>

elements.text: By just rerunning your checks today

_thread_replies.text: You can try checking these breadcrumbs next time an E2E fails, sometimes it's just staging having issues and you can just rerun after a while. And sometimes E2E are failing because of a good reason, alerting us something is wrong, so they are legitimately failing...

elements.text: You can try checking these breadcrumbs next time an E2E fails, sometimes it's just staging having issues and you can just rerun after a while. And sometimes E2E are failing because of a good reason, alerting us something is wrong, so they are legitimately failing...

_thread_replies.text: Apart from that you PR is still blocked because your team's E2E quarantine score

elements.text: Apart from that you PR is still blocked because your team's E2E quarantine score

_thread_replies.text: hope that helps :+1:
Thanks a lot <@U0251UW1YUE>
